TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnchorChanged"> and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.CargoChanged> events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs data includes the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> that raised the event, the anchor or cargo resource associated with the event, and the action that was taken - <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction>, or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation annotation, valuetype System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction action, class System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource resource) cil managed

Docs.param: The annotation that raised the event.
The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> resource of the event.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs class.
Gets the action of the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs.Resource%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventHandler> is called when an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> resource is <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction>, or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction>.

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> that raised the event.
Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> resource associated with the event.
Docs.value: The annotation anchor or cargo resource that was <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction">, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction">, or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction">.
